subject: Basketball
Officiating (Sports)
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. opens its preseason on Oct. 1 amid uncertainly over the contract status of the league’s 57 active referees, with talks to continue.
snippet: The N.B.A. opens its preseason on Oct. 1 amid uncertainly over the contract status of the league’s 57 active referees, with talks to continue.
